nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
中国共产党中央书记处总书记

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1956年至1967年间以及1980年至1982年间设立于中央书记处的领导职务，负责处理中央书记处运作。此职务并非中共中央的主要负责人，与1982年起设立的党内最高领导人职务不同。
description.en: A leading position established within the Central Secretariat of the Communist Party of China between 1956-1967 and 1980-1982, responsible for managing the operations of the Central Secretariat. This position was not the main leader of the CPC Central Committee and is distinct from the supreme leader role established since 1982.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央书记处

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央书记处
en: Central Secretariat of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央机构之一，负责处理中央政治局和其常务委员会的日常工作。
description.en: One of the central bodies of the Communist Party of China, responsible for handling the day-to-day work of the Politburo and its Standing Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记（中央书记处负责人）职务的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors to the position of General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee (head of the Central Secretariat).

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记（中央书记处负责人）职务的前身之一。
description.en: One of the predecessors to the position of General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee (head of the Central Secretariat).

description.zh-cn: 指代中国共产党中央委员会的最高领导人。1956-1967年及1980-1982年的中央委员会总书记不属于此范畴。
description.en: Refers to the supreme leader of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. The General Secretary of the Central Committee during 1956-1967 and 1980-1982 did not fall into this category.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国时期的一场政治运动，期间中央书记处及其总书记职务被撤销。
description.en: A political movement in the People's Republic of China, during which the Central Secretariat and its General Secretary position were abolished.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会
en: 11th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1977年至1982年间的中央领导机构。其第五次全体会议于1980年2月决定重新设立中央书记处。
description.en: The central leading body of the Communist Party of China from 1977 to 1982. Its Fifth Plenary Session in February 1980 decided to re-establish the Central Secretariat.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的领导人，曾任中共中央主席和中共中央总书记。
description.en: A leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as Chairman of the CPC Central Committee and General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会主席

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会主席
en: Chairman of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在1945年至1982年间设立的最高领导人职务，后被中央委员会总书记取代。
description.en: The highest leadership position in the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1982, later replaced by the General Secretary of the Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党、中华人民共和国、中国人民解放军的第二代主要领导人。
description.en: The second-generation paramount leader of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army.

en: Member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局常务委员会的成员，是中国共产党的最高领导层。
description.en: A member of the Standing Committee of the Political Bureau of the CPC Central Committee, which is the top leadership of the Communist Party of China.

en: Vice Premier of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院的副职领导人，协助总理工作。
description.en: Deputy leader of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, assisting the Premier.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防委员会

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防委员会
en: National Defense Commission of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国在1954年至1975年间的国家最高军事机关。
description.en: The supreme military body of the People's Republic of China from 1954 to 1975.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党负责党内纪律检查工作的最高机构。
description.en: The highest body of the Communist Party of China responsible for internal discipline inspection.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The highest state administrative organ of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记是设立于中央书记处的领导职务，负责处理其运作。
description.en: The General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee was a leading position established within the Central Secretariat, responsible for managing its operations.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中共中央秘书长是1956年设立的中央委员会总书记（作为中央书记处负责人）职务的前身。
description.en: The Secretary-General of the CPC Central Committee was the predecessor to the position of General Secretary of the Central Committee (as head of the Central Secretariat) established in 1956.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 中央书记处主席是1956年设立的中央委员会总书记（作为中央书记处负责人）职务的前身。
description.en: The Chairman of the Central Secretariat was the predecessor to the position of General Secretary of the Central Committee (as head of the Central Secretariat) established in 1956.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发后，总书记职务被撤销。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, the position of General Secretary was abolished.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命爆发后，中央书记处被撤销。
description.en: After the outbreak of the Cultural Revolution, the Central Secretariat was abolished.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第十一届中央委员会
relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 在其于1980年2月召开的第五次全体会议上，决定重新设立中央书记处。
description.en: At its Fifth Plenary Session held in February 1980, it was decided to re-establish the Central Secretariat.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 邓小平担任中央书记处总书记，负责处理中央书记处运作。
description.en: Deng Xiaoping served as the General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, responsible for its operations.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央书记处

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在中央书记处重新设立后担任总书记。
description.en: Hu Yaobang served as General Secretary after the Central Secretariat was re-established.

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在担任中央书记处总书记期间，兼任中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: While serving as General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Deng Xiaoping concurrently held the position of a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Politburo.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在担任中央书记处总书记期间，兼任国务院副总理。
description.en: While serving as General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Deng Xiaoping concurrently held the position of Vice Premier of the State Council.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国防委员会

description.zh-cn: 邓小平在担任中央书记处总书记期间，兼任国防委员会副主席。
description.en: While serving as General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Deng Xiaoping concurrently held the position of Vice Chairman of the National Defense Commission.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在担任中央书记处总书记期间，兼任中共中央主席。
description.en: While serving as General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Hu Yaobang concurrently held the position of Chairman of the CPC Central Committee.

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在担任中央书记处总书记期间，兼任中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: While serving as General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Hu Yaobang concurrently held the position of a member of the Standing Committee of the CPC Politburo.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 胡耀邦在担任中央书记处总书记期间，兼任中央纪委第三书记。
description.en: While serving as General Secretary of the Central Secretariat, Hu Yaobang concurrently held the position of Third Secretary of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.
